paper_abstract: Orthopedic surgery treats the musculoskeletal system, in which bleeding is common and can be fatal. To help train future surgeons, researchers developed a serious game to teach blood management skills. Besides using state-of-the-art graphics technologies, the game integrates task-oriented and time-attack scenarios, bonuses, game levels, and performance evaluation tools.
paper_title: Learning Blood Management in Orthopedic Surgery through Gameplay
